text: Old building of the station, demolished in 2008 Łódź Andrzejów is a railway station located in the city of Łódź, in Andrzejów estate, which itself is a part of Widzew district. It was opened in 1865 as one of the stations located between Łódź and Koluszki. The station was incorporated into the city in 1988. Currently it is used mostly by commuter trains, as well as freight trains carrying aggregate to the unloading ramp, which has its branch track going out of station. == References == Category:Railway stations in Łódź Category:Railway stations opened in 1865 Category:Railway stations served by Łódzka Kolej Aglomeracyjna Category:Railway stations served by Przewozy Regionalne InterRegio
title: Łódź Andrzejów railway station
